report.title: UKBMS Annual Summary table Occurrence list
report.description: An occurrence list with a count attribute to be used in the UKBMS Annual Summary table, with filters for Indicia user, date start and end, location.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples parent JOIN samples s ON s.parent_id=parent.id AND s.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON parent.location_id=l.id LEFT JOIN occurrences o on o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# WHERE parent.deleted = false AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(parent.created_by_id AS character varying)='#user_id#' OR '#user_id#' = '') AND (CAST(parent.location_id AS character varying)='#location_id#' OR '#location_id#'='') #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, parent.id as sample_id, s.id as subsample_id, l.name as location_name, parent.location_id, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, cttl.taxon_meaning_id, cttl.preferred_taxon as taxon, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common, parent.created_by_id as user_id

order_bys.order_by: cttl.taxonomic_sort_order, cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon, parent.location_id, sample_id, o.id DESC

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location
